hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #lakeside lab diving experiment# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Zora Scale#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to the #Fire Medallion#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: I came here to chew bubblegum and play rando. And I'm all out of bubblegum.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Loach#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Lens of Truth# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #2# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #3# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #the Fire Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a small #Fairy Fountain#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Deku Tree#.
